name: Horn of Beastcalling
effect: Banish Horn of Beastcalling: The next Beast ally card you activate this turn costs 3 less to activate. Class Bonus: Draw a card. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: Banish Horn of Beastcalling: The next Beast ally card you activate this turn costs 3 less to activate. Class Bonus: Draw a card. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

rule.description: The cost decrease only affects Beast ally cards that are activated, not materialized.

The type of cost decreased is based on the card's default cost type. In most cases, it will decrease reserve cost because it only affects activation costs. However, if a card can be activated from the material deck and has a memory cost as its default cost, the memory cost will decrease by 3.

flavor: Few beasts can resist Gaia's call.
